main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported on January 30, 1961, featuring ground-radar and visual observations of various objects, primarily at Forbes AFB and McConnell AFB in Kansas.
interesting points: Radar detected blips at 90Â° above the horizon, fluctuating in size from a quarter to a dime and changing colors from green to brilliant white,Two witnesses reported visual sightings including a bright ball that faded in size and brilliance before disappearing,The duration of sightings varied between approximately 10-15 seconds for radar and around 30 seconds for visual observers,Certain military personnel described the object as resembling a meteor or a flare,Other reports from surrounding areas indicated similar sightings throughout the night.
sighted object: Radar blips and a bright round object
witness description: military personnel including control tower operators
